page.title: 03A COUNTRY BOYS DAY
page.content: We are country boys-Joe and Stevie. There are good and bad things about living in the country.Good things like having lots of room to play,being able to shoot things,climbing trees,not many cars around etc.There are lots of nice things to see like insects ,birds, trees, flowers,hedges,animals etc.We like to play games like football,kick post,hide and seek,but the bad part is there aren't many people to play with. We like to go riding our BMX bikes.Joe split his tyre on a piece of glass in the old pit.It is safe to take your dog for a walk.You can grow your own food to eat like apples,peas,pears and other vegetables.We can go to play with our friends and relations. Many of our friends who live in the village have their friends living nearer to them. Some boys like to play with girls-we don't.
